entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: bensaviofernandez/recipe-bot: Quick Recipe Recommender is a lightweight Node.js app that uses Azure Computer Vision to detect ingredients from an image (or accepts a text list), queries those ingredients against a Cosmos DB of ‚Äúeasy‚Äù recipes, then leverages Azure OpenAI (GPT) to generate human-friendly, one-sentence recipe descriptions‚Äîall presented in a clean, browser-based UI
entry.content: Quick Recipe Recommender is a lightweight Node.js app that uses Azure Computer Vision to detect ingredients from an image (or accepts a text list), queries those ingredients against a Cosmos DB of ‚Äúeasy‚Äù recipes, then leverages Azure OpenAI (GPT) to generate human-friendly, one-sentence recipe descriptions‚Äîall presented in a clean, browser-based UI
